timeline.bodyText:
The defaults are the same as the public RestHighLevelClient ctor (give or take a Collections.emptyList vs new ArrayList)
I suspect there is a good reason you added this class but I can't see it.
timeline.author: davidkyle

replies.bodyText: @davidkyle the public ctor for the RestHighLevelClient takes a client builder. Since the rest client is already built, I need to access the protected ctor that accepts the built low level client.
replies.author: benwtrent

timeline.author: davidkyle

timeline.bodyText: The snapshot docs are small increase the PageParams to 100 if not more!
timeline.author: davidkyle

replies.bodyText:
The snapshot docs are small increase the PageParams to 100 if not more!

The reason I am limiting here is that I don't want to write an insane amount of deprecation warnings not necessarily a limit in the docs we search for.
